FROM ( SELECT [Extent1].[HokmYear] AS [HokmYear], [Extent1].[Seq] AS [Seq], [Extent1].[EmpNo] AS [EmpNo], [Extent1].[SequenceNo] AS [SequenceNo], [Extent1].[RunDate] AS [RunDate], [Extent1].[Grooh] AS
